availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Tennessee native. Married to Brunette Jones. Father of George Jones, Elisha Jones, Julia Jones, Conzada Jones, Mary Jones, Susan Jones, and James Jones. Farmer in Dekalb County, Tennessee, in 1850. Blacksmith in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Dekalb County, District 14, p. 45B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Burnesville, p. 21.
